      • doCorrection

        public void doCorrection()
        Will perform the odometry correction properly if the light sensor is place in the bottom left quadrant of a known black cross.

      • prepareCorrection

        public void prepareCorrection()
        Will place the robot in a decent position if it is place +/-10 cm inside the bottom left tile of odometry correction corner. The angle must have a maximum error of 15Ëš.
